title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: LLM runner and library that lets you run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API with sync/async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models as LLM and chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); runs in Docker and supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with active development and community contributions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Go CLI that adds extra commands (list, prune, update) and progress bars on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration allowing Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET/C# client for Ollama with NuGet package ‘OllamaSharp’.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) published to Docker Hub; includes docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python example showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models via slash commands; supports threads and moderation.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command to query local models right from Slack.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node that integrates Ollama models into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an ‘Ask Ollama’ command to summarize or continue writing notes using local models.

title: ollama-rust-sdk
summary: Another Rust SDK focused on ergonomic APIs and native tokio streaming; published as ‘ollama-sdk’ on crates.io.
